This script updates the CORINE Land Cover 2018 data for Belgium by reading the shapefile, merging it with a legend, and saving the processed data as an RDS file.

The `.rda` file has a `ETRS89 / Belgian Lambert 2008` projection (EPSG:3812).

```{r read data}
CLC18_BE <- sf::st_read("~/GitHub/backoffice-wild-analyse/Data/Spatial/CORINE/CLC18_BE.shp")

clc_legend <- readr::read_delim("~/GitHub/backoffice-wild-analyse/Data/Libraries/Lib_CLC_legend.csv",
                         col_types = readr::cols(CLC_CODE = readr::col_character()),
                         delim = ";")
```

```{r combine}
CLC18_BE <- CLC18_BE %>% 
  dplyr::left_join(clc_legend, c("CODE_18" = "CLC_CODE")) 

table(CLC18_BE$LABEL_Grouped, useNA = "ifany")
```

```{r save as RDS}
save(CLC18_BE, 
     file = "./data/CLC18_BE.rda", 
     compress = "xz")
```
